aboutpara: I am currently a Interactive Designer/Software Engineer. I graduated from the Interactive Design Department of National Taipei University of Technology. My creations focus on the possibilities of interactive multimedia and cross-domain cooperation, and I am happy to share educational articles that everyone can easily understand on the Internet platform. My works span interactive design, XR applications, body sensation and devices, and cross-border cooperation with cognitive psychology and art theater. I have also participated in many Ministry of Science and Technology projects. At present, I mainly focus on cross-domain research and development, and continue to explore new technologies and applications.
